Posts.Content: was wondering if ther is anyone else in the same position as me as i was diagnosed with breast cancer in dec 11, i new it had spread to my lymph nodes as there was a lump under my arm,  inbetween being diagnosed and waiting for chemo to start a lump came up jst above my colar bone, my doc did say it was suspicious, i have now  had 6 cycles of chemo tht i responded very well to, had a mastectomy & lymph node clearance, i got my patholagy reports bk on thurs & was told i had to have more chemo although they had got all the cancer i was stage 3 so they want to be certain its gone, i then got sent through for a scan & aspiration test on the lump above my colar bone, it is the cancer, there was 2 tiny lumps there,  i am now waiting for my appointment on fri to see what the nxt steps will be, i looked this up on the internet & its stage 3c when it has spread to gland above the collar bone can anyone give me any information on this as i am now as worried as i was when i was first diagnosed in dec thanks
Posts.Title: more shocking news
